name: Couchtuner Daymode~
description: This is based on my other style Couchtuner, Elegant~ and shares all of the same features. The difference is that Coucthuner, Daymode~ is meant for use during daytime viewing. Save your eyes!
additional_info:
08/23/16 - 01.1.2 ---

* added support for couch-tuner.ag and couch-tuner.city domains

05/19/2016 - 01.1 ---

* added small shadows to certain elements to interrupt the flatness of this style
-- bug: disqus overlaps shadow when scrolled to the bottom of the feed

03/28/2016 - 01 ---

* release
